text: Ezɨ nguazir me Josepɨn otarir ivariam Manasen anabamɨn adarazi bagha bɨghizir nguazim, me an ovavir boribagh anɨngi. Ezɨ Makir, a Manasen otarir ivariam, a Gileatɨn afeziam, a mɨdorozir gumazir bar aghuim. Kamaghɨn me faraghavɨra Gileatɨn Distrik ko Basanɨn Distrighɨn itir nguaziba isa an ovavir boribagh anɨngi.
